Rulings.Tengu:
● If you cannot Special Summon, you cannot activate this card.
● This card’s Special Summon cannot be negated by “Thunder King Rai-Oh” or “Horn of Heaven”.
● You can chain “Royal Oppression” to this card’s activation. (but not when the Monster is Fusion Summoned).

Rulings.Cat:
● “Future Fusion” must remain on the field for the effect to activate. If it isn't on the field during the 2nd Standby Phase, then you do not Special Summon the Fusion Monster.
● You can't use substitute Fusion Material Monsters such as “King of the Swamp”. You must use the monsters listed on the Fusion Monster Card.
● You can't activate “Future Fusion” if you do not have a Fusion Monster in your Extra Deck and the appropriate Fusion Material Monsters in your Main Deck.
● Destroying the monster when “Future Fusion” leaves the field is an effect that can't be chained to.
● If the Special Summoned Fusion Monster leaves the field without being destroyed then “Future Fusion” will remain on the field meaninglessly.
● You can't select a Fusion Monster that has another Fusion Monster as one of its Materials, such as “Dark Flare Knight” or “Elemental Hero Shining Flare Wingman”, for “Future Fusion”. The Fusion Material Monsters must be sent from the Main Deck.
● You can chain “Royal Oppression” to negate “Future Fusion” when it is activated (placed applying).
● “Future Fusion’s” effect counts Standby Phases, not turns, so “Pyro Clock of Destiny” would have no effect.
● You can't select a Fusion Monster that can only be Special Summoned by the method written in its text, like 'Gladiator Beast Heraklinos', 'Elemental Hero Grand Neos', 'XYZ-Dragon Cannon', or 'Evil Hero Dark Gaia'.

Rulings.Base:
1. "Future Fusion" must remain on the field for the effect to activate. If it is not on the field during the 2nd Standby Phase, then you do not Special Summon the Fusion Monster.
2. You cannot use substitute Fusion Material Monsters such as "King of the Swamp". You must use the monsters listed on the Fusion Monster Card.
3. You cannot activate "Future Fusion" if you do not have a Fusion Monster in your Extra Deck and the appropriate Fusion Material Monsters in your Main Deck.
4. Destroying the monster when "Future Fusion" is removed from the field is an effect that cannot be chained to.
5. If the Special Summoned Fusion Monster is removed from the field without being destroyed then "Future Fusion" will remain on the field meaninglessly.
6. You cannot select a Fusion Monster that has another Fusion Monster as one of its Materials, such as "Dark Flare Knight" or "Elemental HERO Shining Flare Wingman", for "Future Fusion". The Fusion Material Monsters must be sent from the Main Deck.
7. You can chain "Royal Oppression" to negate "Future Fusion" when it is activated (placed face-up on the field).
8. The effect of "Future Fusion" counts Standby Phases, not turns, so "Pyro Clock of Destiny" would have no effect.
9. You cannot select a Fusion Monster that can only be Special Summoned by the method written in its text, like "Gladiator Beast Heraklinos", "Elemental HERO Grand Neos", "XYZ-Dragon Cannon", or "Evil HERO Dark Gaia".

PSCT.Tengu:
① If this card is activated: 
Reveal 1 Fusion Monster from your Extra Deck, and send its Materials from your Deck to GY, also, during your 2nd Standby Phase after activation, Fusion Summon 1 Monster from your Extra Deck with the same name as that revealed monster, and target it with this card.
③ If this leaves the field, destroy that monster.
④ If that monster is destroyed, destroy this card.
